p: Moreover, the antioxidant activity of the EO of T. pruinosum was estimated by using the DPPH method which is one of the most commonly used assays due to its simplicity and high sensitively [ 32]. The established results of the current study revealed that the DPPH method antioxidant results revealed that the EO of T. pruinosum has antioxidant potential with an IC 50 value of 16.98±0.84 µg/ml in comparison with the positive control molecule (Trolox) which has an IC 50 value of 2.09±0.17 µg/ml.
